item.description:
Join us for Boston's biggest fall singles event.  Dates with traffic stopping police officers, smoldering fire fighters and some of Boston's most eligible single guys and ladies are auctioned off during a live auction hosted by Boston radio personalities Karson and Kennedy.

Attention ladies: Each bachelor will come with a pair of sexy high heels for the lady with the winning bid, courtesy of Sofft Shoes!

Special Guests: New England Patriots Cheerleaders!

Each "couple" will receive a gift certificate to a Boston hot spot to use on their date.

Some of the Improper Bostonian's Most Eligible Singles will also be auctioned off!

Over 500 guests attend annually and one lucky couple even got married!

Event also features a silent auction with airline tickets, sports memorabilia, gift certificates and more.

Tickets are only $17 and include a gift bag. Get your tickets in advance at www.projectsmile.org/events.htm

All of the proceeds benefit Project Smile, the non profit organization started by Catherine, your Meet Up group organizer! Project Smile partners with police and fire departments, homeless shelters and the Dept. of Children and Families to help children who are involved in traumatic events. This is Project Smile's biggest fundraiser of the year.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) in the event area. If you have trouble finding us, please call 774 232 0000.
item.name: Project Smile 5th Annual Date Auction. Boston's Biggest Fall Singles Event
